response.original_title: The Big Game XXVII - Sylvester Vs Tweety
response.overview: The Big Game XXVII: Sylvester vs. Tweety was a four-hour TV special that aired on Cartoon Network on 30 January 1999. It was the second installment in the "Big Game" series of marathon specials parodying the Super Bowl, and the first one to focus on Looney Tunes characters (the first such special, which aired in 1998, spotlighted Tom and Jerry).
response.title: The Big Game XXVII - Sylvester Vs Tweety
